posts.post_title: FS: Ungraded T206 NO LONGER FOR SALE
posts.post_content:
Available for sale are the following cards [NOTE - IF YOU WANT TO PURCHASE ANY CARD MAILING OF THAT CARD WILL BE DELAYED UNTIL THE WEEK OF SEPTEMBER 3RD.  MY RESPONSE TO ANY INQUIRY MAY BE DELAYED UNTIL THAT WEEK AS WELL]:

T206 - Bill Burns [Piedmont 350/25] - $40
T206 - Bob Unglaub [Sweet Caporal 350/30] - $45
T206 - Mike Mitchell [Piedmont 350/25] - $50
T206 - Dick Hoblitzell [Piedmont 350/25] - $55
T206 - Charley Starr [Sweet Caporal 350/30] - SOLD
T206 - Jiggs Donohue [Sweet Caporal 150/25] - $55
T206 - Bunk Congalton [Sweet Caporal 350/30] - SOLD
T206 - Billy Campbell [Sweet Caporal 350/30] - $60

POLAR BEAR:

T206 - George Merritt [Polar Bear] - $85
T206 - Hooks Wiltse [Polar Bear] - $85
T206 - Harry Davis [Polar Bear] - $85
T206 - Donnie Bush [Polar Bear] - $95

Please add $5 for shipping.

If you want to purchase any card:

1. The first person to post "I'll take it" will get the card. This post will secure the card in front of anyone else who may be in communication with me regarding that card.
2. Email me at [url]jmanners51@gmail.com[/url] by putting the name of the card in the subject line and your address in the text.
3. Remit payment by PayPal (PPFF).
4. I don't have easy access to a Post Office so please allow up to 5 days for me to get to the Post Office to mail the card.
